akn:section.akn:heading: Transfer of personnel, records, functions, and authority.

akn:content.akn:p: The Mayor shall provide for the orderly transfer to the Department all of the authority, responsibilities, duties, assets, and functions of MPD pertaining to forensic science services, including:

The Mayor shall provide for the orderly transfer to the Department all of the authority, responsibilities, duties, assets, and functions of the Department of Health pertaining to public health laboratory services, including:
The transfers set forth in subsections (a) and (a-1) of this section shall occur no later than October 1, 2012.
